title: Summary
paras:
I've always been a gamer since I was a kid (not good though). Playing game is so much fun, you also can learn new things with it. With that in mind, I decided to become a programmer so that I can share the joy of playing game with other people through the game I make.

Currently, I'm a 3rd year student and majoring in Software Engineering.

Speciaties: Mobile Development, Software Architecture, Web Development
